title: [M-02] Missing nonce in `LISTING_TYPEHASH` affects EIP-712 and signatures
summary: This bug report discusses a problem with the `Marketplace.generateListingSignatureHash()` function. The function is not compliant with the `EIP-712` standard, which can cause issues with the signature validation and listing process. The bug is caused by the `nonce` parameter not being included in the `LISTING_TYPEHASH` constant. The recommendation is to update the `LISTING_TYPEHASH` to include the `nonce` parameter.
